metadata.title: CVE-2024-26902 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: perf:RISCV: Fix panic on pmu overflow handler (1 << idx) of int is not desiredwhen setting bits in unsigned long overflowed_ctrs, use BIT() instead. Thispanic happens when running 'perf record -e branches' on sophgo sg2042.
